attributes.comment:
Hi. As an adoptive parent I am writing to voice my opinions on the proposed
increase in fees for the I-600a application. As adoptive parents we have many
fees to incur. This increase in fees will simply make it that much more difficult to
bring our children home. Also, with the increase in wait times for many countries
we are having to submit our I-600a froms twice, which is already increasing our
fees, to increase the fee on top of that would make it even more difficult.

Thank You for listening and please consider the heartache that adoptive parents
go through in trying to bring their children home. It does not need to be added to
by adding more fees.

Thanks,
Michelle Green

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Michelle L. Green
